title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the opening game of the NFL season where the Bills dominated the Rams and the one thing LA should be worried about if they hope to repeat as Super Bowl champions. He believes Josh Allen is clearly the most talented QB in the entire NFL right now. He shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 1 of the NFL season. Plus, Hall of Famer and NFL on Fox analyst Terry Bradshaw joins the show in studio to talk about the Steelers starting Mitchell Trubisky over Kenny Pickett and what we can expect from the Cowboys this year. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
